We visited this place for 2 days and tried various food and coffee ‚òï it was really amazing ü§©, we tried Burger üçî, Spaghetti üçù, Chicken Pesto and Veg Pesto Sandwich ü•™. In coffee we tried Vietnamese, Cold coffee, Cappuccino etc. and nothing disappoints us.

I recently visited Caravela Cafe in Margao for a morning breakfast, and it was an absolutely delightful experience. From the moment I walked in, the positive vibe of the cafe made it a welcoming start to the day.
The breakfast was one of the best I've had. We ordered the Eggs Benedict with Pork Ham, the Pesto Chicken Sandwich, and the Turkish Eggs. The Turkish Eggs were particularly outstanding‚Äîtruly a solid 5/5. Each dish was prepared with great care and tasted fantastic.
Their coffees are equally impressive. I couldn't resist having two cups and tried the Coffee Latte, Cappuccino and American Espresso. Each cup was brewed to perfection and really complemented the meal.
The quality and taste of every bite justified every penny spent.
The staff were incredibly kind and attentive, adding to the overall positive experience.
One of the sweetest touches was when I took a parcel home. They included a handwritten note on the inside, which was a lovely gesture.
This cafe is a gem, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for top-notch food and coffee. I‚Äôll definitely be visiting again!

Caravela Caf√© had been on my must-visit list for Goa, and I finally got to experience it during my latest trip‚Äîand it did not disappoint! I had the best cold coffee here; it was absolutely amazing. The crispy French toast was unique and delicious, a refreshing twist on the classic. We also tried the cappuccino, omelette, and hash browns‚Äîeverything was super tasty.

The atmosphere is inviting and calm, making it the perfect spot to relax. The service was excellent, and they even have ample parking space, which is a big plus. While the prices are on the higher side, the quality and experience make it worth it.
Overall, a wonderful caf√© and definitely worth a visit!
